overview: Children of the Left speaks to the legacy of Communism in the Middle East, North Africa and beyond, which led many families, the artistâ€™s included, to flee their homes. In Iraq, communist parties presented the greatest opposition to Saddam Hussein. The film is a kind of historical and political cartography infused with personal biography, accepting the inheritance of a historical and political struggle that is contradictory, ongoing, and displaced.
title: Children of the Left
